RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 47. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 6 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONE RICH KITTEN away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside into the far turn, gave up the advantage to the runner up near the five sixteenths pole, fought back gamely along the rail under right handed urging and got back up in time. DOLCE MARIE pressured the winner two wide into the far turn, made the lead, set the pace until deep stretch then finished second best. MY TWO JAKES never far back, finished with good courage three wide. MANDOLIN BREEZE was restless in the gate, allowed to settle, then rallied outside rivals four wide through the stretch in a determined effort. GHOSTLY REVIVAL also restless in the gate, was no factor. HALO EFFECT stalked the pace three wide and was through after a half. WELLOILEDCAT saved ground and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: One Rich Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace rail, headed, fought back gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Ghostly Revival
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Welloiledcat
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Mandolin Breeze
ENTRY.OWNER: Emerson Equistions LLC and Bestard Brian
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, allowed to settle, finished determinedly 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Jakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Dolce Marie
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Halo Effect
ENTRY.OWNER: Yoder Susan D and Yoder Lori D
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 10900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 6. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CALL WEST trailed into the stretch, closed with a rush five wide under right handed urging through the final sixteenth of a mild and got up in the final strides. BROADWAY JONES away alertly, set the pace along the inside, shook clear under right handed urging in upper stretch then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. LAZARUS PROJECT unhurried early, swung wide and closed a gap later six wide. RULING FRONT chased the winner two wide and was outfinished. BIG FALCON ROCKET stalked the pace three wide and went evenly. REINSURE close up from the start, offered a mild bid four wide nearing the quarter pole then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Call West
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed with a rush, 5 wide, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Ruling Front
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Broadway Jones
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, shook clear inside, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Lazarus Project
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide, late gain, 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Big Falcon Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Reinsure
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move 4 wide, empty,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SCOOP THERE IT IS lead briefly along the inside into the first turn, gave up the lead, waited patiently along the inside into the far tur, altered three wide past the five sixteenths pole, surged to the front two wide at the top of the stretch then drew off at will to win as much the best under confident handling. FLAXEN trailed into the stretch, closed willingly in the four then five paths and got up for second. SKY with the second flight two wide, darted to the lead into the far turn, opened a clear advantage quickly, set the pace to the top of the stretch, altered course to the three path once passed by the winner and was outfinished for second. COURTED was no factor. YEGUITA QUEEN bore out at the start, rushed to contention four then three wide on the clubhouse turn, prompted the pace into the far turn then was used up. HERO'S DAUGHTER was no threat. MACHTENHAIRONFIRE sprinted to the lead two wide on the first turn, set the pace into the second bend then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Hero's Daughter
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Flaxen
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed willingly, 5path, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Scoop There It Is
ENTRY.COMMENT: waited inside, angled 3 wide 2nd turn, took over 3/16p, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Machtenhaironfire
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick move 2 wide 2nd turn, led, altered 3p 3/16, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Courted
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Yeguita Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out start, rushed 4-3wide, speed 5/8, used up,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 55. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 6 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RATATAT chased the pace into the stretch, matched stride through the final furlong, dug in late under left handed urging and proved best while fully extended. EMERALD EYES stalked the pace along the inside into the stretch, altered course to the five path and rallied for second. HAPPYBDAYMRPREZ rushed to the lead soon after the start, set the pace along the inside until deep stretch, dug in determinedly but was outfinished in the final stages. LATE DATE void of early speed, was no threat. GIMME CLEARANCE was through after a half. SWEETER THAN HONEY was outrun. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION RACE WAS HAND TIMED.

ENTRY.NAME: Emerald Eyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, altered course 5path top lane, rallied for second

ENTRY.NAME: Sweeter Than Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Happybdaymrprez
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace inside late stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Ratatat
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, long drive, 2 wide, proved best, left handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Gimme Clearance
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Late Date
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 21600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Races Where Entered For $8,000 Or Less NotConsider ed In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOSH'N set the early pace along the inside, was headed on the turn, fought back gamely under left handed urging along the rail through the stretch and proved best under confident handling. KEEPING SCORE never far back, rallied steadily through the stretch five wide and got up for second. THE PINK Z stalked the pace near the inside into the stretch, altered course three wide inside the three sixteenths pole then finished determinedly between rivals. IT'SGOODTOBESEEN pressed the pace two wide into the turn, gained a narrow lead, matched strides inside the sixteenth pole and was outfinished. WILDCAT BILL had speed from the start, inched closer four wide into the stretch then failed to sustain that bid. SURROUNDER failed to menace. MARVIN'S EXPRESS was no factor. STUNT MAN was no threat. ACCURATE was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Josh'n
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace inside, headed turn, fought back gamely, left urging

ENTRY.NAME: The Pink Z
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, altered course 3 wide upper stretch, determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: Surrounder
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcat Bill
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Accurate
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Stunt Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Keeping Score
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally, 5 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: It'sgoodtobeseen
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Marvin's Express
ENTRY.OWNER: Tooley Jennifer and Beckett Racing Team LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 18400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OHIO PLAYER sprinted to the lead inside rivals while well off the rail in the four path, set all the pace, drew well clear on the turn and won as much the best while being kept to task under strong handling. THAT'S THE WAY was bumped at the start, trailed into the stretch, swung wide, closed determinedly and got up for second in the 6path. BABA LOOEY was bumped by MUCHO PRIMO, forced out into THAT'S THE WAY causing a chain reaction of bumping to his outside and rallied belatedly for a minor share in the four path. PLATE IT UP was bumped at he start, swung wide and passed tiring rivals in the six path. CHOCOLATE RABBIT chased the winner four then three wide into the stretch and gave way. JACK BE FAST also bumped at the start, chased the winner three then two wide and was through after a half. MUCHO PRIMO bore out at the start causing a chain reaction of bumping to his outside, was a forward factor into the turn then stopped. THE RIDERS OF THAT'S THE WAY AND PLATE IT UP LODGED CLAIMS OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE AT THE START. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Player
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace off rail, drew off turn, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho Primo
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out start, bumped, close inside, stopped lane

ENTRY.NAME: Baba Looey
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, forced out start, belatedly 4path

ENTRY.NAME: That's the Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, trailed, swung wide, up place, jockey claimed foul,

ENTRY.NAME: Plate It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, swung wide, passed tiring rivals, claimed foul

ENTRY.NAME: Jack Be Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, chased, 3-2wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Chocolate Rabbit
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 4-3wide, gave way lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Purse 27500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 6 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances ) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOURBONWITHGINGER stalked the early pace three wide, assumed command entering the turn, set the balance of the pace, shook clear late under right handed urging and prevailed under confident handling. HARTFUL HOPE allowed to settle, rallied four wide through the stretch in the five path and finished second best. LEWD trailed early, swung wide and closed a gap late in the six path. OAXACA bumped at the start, battled for the lead two wide through the turn then faded late. SHE'S REDNECKER bumped at the start, contested the lead along the inside through the turn and weakened late. EGG NOG bumped at the start and was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: She's Rednecker
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, contested inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Oaxaca
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, battled 2 wide, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Egg Nog
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Hartful Hope
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, rallied 4 wide 5path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbonwithginger
ENTRY.OWNER: Tooley Jennifer Dolce Vita Farm and Beckett Racing Team
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3 wide, took over 3/8 pole, shook clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Lewd
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, swung wide, late gain,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 6 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where E ntered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I'LL FIGURE IT OUT allowed to settle, closed with a burst of speed four wide under right handed urging through deep stretch and got up in the final strides. FIRST SONG never far back, rallied four wide to make the lead in upper stretch, set the balance of the pace and just missed hanging on. SIMPLY VALID bumped at the start, battled for the lead three then two wide into the stretch and faded late. HEY EUGENE unhurried early, passed tiring rivals through the stretch five wide while out in the eight path. PATIO PARTY bumped at the start, pressed4the pace four then three wide into the stretch and weakened late. ROCK ON KITTEN was no factor. GIV'EM THE BIZ dueled for the lead along the inside to the seven sixteenths pole then gave way. LUCKY STREAK contested the lead two wide then along the inside through the turn and was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Giv'em the Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside 7/16 pole, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Streak
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2w, inside turn, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: I'll Figure It Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, closed fast, 4 wide, right handed urging, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Rock On Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Eugene
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, passed tiring rivals, 5 wide, 8path

ENTRY.NAME: Simply Valid
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, dueled 3-2wide, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Patio Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed4-3wide, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: First Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied 4 wide, led late, caught
